name: Budco
overview:
Budco is a leading fulfillment and direct marketing company that was established in 1982. We help a wide variety of Fortune 500 companies build strong relationships with their key business, consumer and employee audiences.

We believe that every touch point within the fulfillment and direct marketing process provides an opportunity to connect and to begin a meaningful two-way communication that ultimately shapes a relationship. That’s what dialogue is. And when you keep the dialogue going in a relevant way, you add value to the relationship, nurturing it, strengthening it and making it better. For our clients, successfully creating and managing dialogue translates into informed, satisfied and loyal business partners, consumers and employees. And that’s good business. Budco Marketing Fulfillment, Marketing Outsourcing, Pharmaceutical Fulfillment

Whether its designing an eCommerce Web site, correctly fulfilling and shipping a product order, generating a relevant and compelling message through a multichannel direct marketing campaign using mail, eMail and the Web or producing an analytical analysis to optimize marketing performance in a concise and accurate manner … all of these are touch points and opportunities to manage dialogue and build strong relationships.

Budco has a wide array of in-house resources to develop and execute innovative, end-to-end solutions that deliver results. Results are achieved at both the strategic and tactical level and are focused on the following:

Budco Marketing Fulfillment, Marketing Outsourcing, Pharmaceutical Fulfillment

Reducing cost
Increasing revenue
Increasing customer satisfaction
Increasing speed to market

milestones.description: Budco Acquires South Shore Venture Enterprises
milestones.source_description: Budco Acquires South Shore Venture Enterprises
